articles.title: Abortion News: Fight Shifts to New Battlegrounds
articles.description: Abortion-rights groups vow to challenge state bans while abortion opponents push to bolster restrictions. At churches and Pride festivals, Americans respond with a range of emotions after Friday’s Supreme Court ruling striking down Roe v. Wade.
